text:
Podcast production responsibilities include:

- Multi-camera switching via ATEM during live-to-tape capture.
- Dedicated audio capture with clean gain structure and treatment.
- Live monitoring of levels, noise, room tone, and compression thresholds.
- Marker placement and metadata notes for post-production efficiency.
- Delivering isolated camera angles for editors when needed.
- Ensuring consistent branding, framing, and lighting across episodes.

This workflow combines AV engineering precision with editorial awareness.
